short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change vk.com emojis to selected ones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows changing vk.com apple-like emoji to be similar to google ones (jellies). Easy install and configure(two clicks). Please, reload vk.com tabs after extension installation to take effect
